member.name: PRJ_UPDATE_TYPES
member.summary: Flags to specify whether updates will be allowed given the state of a file or directory on disk.

member.name: PRJ_UPDATE_TYPES.PRJ_UPDATE_NONE
member.summary: Allow update only if the item is a placeholder (whether hydrated or not).

member.name: PRJ_UPDATE_TYPES.PRJ_UPDATE_ALLOW_DIRTY_METADATA
member.summary: Allow update if the item is a placeholder or a dirty placeholder.

member.name: PRJ_UPDATE_TYPES.PRJ_UPDATE_ALLOW_DIRTY_DATA
member.summary: Allow update if the item is a placeholder or if it is a full file.

member.name: PRJ_UPDATE_TYPES.PRJ_UPDATE_ALLOW_TOMBSTONE
member.summary: Allow update if the item is a placeholder or if it is a tombstone.

member.name: PRJ_UPDATE_TYPES.PRJ_UPDATE_ALLOW_READ_ONLY
member.summary: Allow update regardless of whether the DOS read-only bit is set on the item.
